text:
Wanted to call something out so it does not trip other people up: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/resources/what-are-the-submission-requirements-for-the-template-marketplace#4-4>

As we found out, even having an optional field on a module to allow for HubDB to be used as a data source is not allowed. Hoping it will change in the future where we had build out some really neat front end chart functionality that could use HubDB as a source. Simple enough to modify our module to use comma separated values, but it could have been a really neat way to showcase HubDB otherwise.
Yea I think as long as HubDB is only available for Pro and Enterprise, it'll never be able to be sold/used in the Marketplace.
You can have Basic, you just need the Website Add-on ($300 version)
Will HubDB ever be able to be included in the Marketplace if this is the case? Perhaps having a disclaimer on the item description page that HubDB is required for template use?
